com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did

Class HcsDidTopicListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageListener<HcsDidMessage>
      • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did.HcsDidTopicListener

  • public class HcsDidTopicListener
extends MessageListener<HcsDidMessage>
    A listener of confirmed HcsDidMessage messages from a DID topic. Messages are received from a given mirror node, parsed and validated.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageListener

        decrypter, errorHandler, filters, ignoreErrors, invalidMessageHandler, query, subscriptionHandle, topicId

    • Constructor Detail

      • HcsDidTopicListener

        public HcsDidTopicListener(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicId didTopicId)
        Creates a new instance of a DID topic listener for the given consensus topic. By default, invalid messages are ignored and errors are not.
        Parameters:
        didTopicId - The DID consensus topic ID.
